title: Boku no Kanojo ga Majimesugiru Sho-bitch na Ken
synopsis: Haruka Shinozaki has been interested in the class representative, Akiho Kousaka, since his first year in high school. She is attractive, good at sports, and is an all-around model student. Since they are in the same class this year, Shinozaki decides to confess his feelingsâ€”and, to his shock, Kousaka agrees to be his girlfriend!
